title: How do I turn off drive mode when using Google maps for navigation?
content: How do you disable Drive Mode while using Google Maps? I have disabled drive mode in my settings, but if I need navigation it turns reactivates. Unfortunately, my phone is smarter than my 2006 Chevy Cobalt which has is a standard with crank windows (reference for the level of tech). Audio does not play on my Bluetooth for calls or the phone's speakers. So, I end up looking at my phone for directions which is super safe. Any assis or insight would be greatly appreciated.
